summary: A barbarian warrior becomes a king when he defeats a king in armed combat and the king's heir conspire to overthrow him and reclaim the throne by resurrecting an evil sorceress.
cast: Kevin Sorbo|Tia Carrere|Thomas Ian Griffith|Litefoot|Roy Brocksmith|Harvey Fierstein|Karina Lombard|Edward Tudor-Pole|Douglas Henshall|Joe Shaw|Sven-Ole Thorsen|Terry O'Neill|Pat Roach|John Hallam|Peter Petruna|Boris Bacik|Paul Kynman|Paul Weston
keywords: character name as title|kull the conqueror character|protohistory|movie flop|king
title: Kull, el conquistador
